ygData.subject: Re: Queen of Fools
ygData.msgSnippet: Since we figured on talking about stupid deaths, here is what I did. Being the adventurous fool that I am, I decided to climb the wizard teleport spires in
ygData.messageBody:
Since we figured on talking about stupid deaths, here is what I did. Being
the adventurous fool that I am, I decided to climb the wizard teleport
spires in North Karana. Being the wood elf that I am I climbed to the top
of the spire quite easily and proceeded to sit down while I waited for my
friends to arrive.

Of course I forgot about the z-axis attack ability of mobs, so I left to
get a snack and I return to find myself under attack by a griffawn that
someone trained on me. So quickly I stand up proceed to begin running.

Loading Please Wait....

Oh yeah I fell to my death. Boy did I feel stupid.

Treilanin Loreweaver
